text: Live is an album of live recordings by Guano Apes. It was released in 2003. ==Track listing== #"Quietly" (3:40) #"No Speech" (3:46) #"Money & Milk" (2:38) #"Pretty in Scarlet" (3:56) #"We Use the Pain" (2:41) #"Living in a Lie" (4:17) #"Open Your Eyes" (2:54) #"Dick" (2:44) #"Sing That Song" (3:18) #"Mine All Mine" (5:18) #"Sugar Skin" (3:59) #"Move a Little Closer" (3:19) #"You Can't Stop Me" (3:35) #"Scratch the Pitch" (3:30) #"Big in Japan" (3:27) #"Dödel Up" (7:40) #"Wash It Down" (3:44) #"Diokhan" (4:35) #"Gogan" (2:41) #"Lords of the Boards" (5:27) ==Limited edition== A limited edition version of the album was also released with an additional 20 tracks contained on a bonus 80 minute DVD. ==DVD chapter listing== #"Quietly" (3:33) #"No Speech" (3:43) #"Money & Milk" (2:36) #"Pretty in Scarlet" (3:49) #"We Use the Pain" (2:37) #"Living in a Lie" (4:19) #"Open Your Eyes" (2:50) #"Dick" (3:33) #"Sing That Song" (3:08) #"Mine All Mine" (5:13) #"Sugar Skin" (3:58) #"Move a Little Closer" (3:18) #"You Can't Stop Me" (3:33) #"Scratch the Pitch" (3:27) #"Big in Japan" (2:58) #"Trompeter" (2:36) #"Dödel Up" (7:34) #"Diokhan" (4:32) #"Kumba Yo!" (3:36) #"Lords of the Boards" (5:55) ==References== Category:Guano Apes albums Category:2003 live albums Category:GUN Records live albums
title: Live (Guano Apes album)
